00003 #include "ORTrig4ChanShaperCompoundProcessor.hh"

00005 ORTrig4ChanShaperCompoundProcessor::ORTrig4ChanShaperCompoundProcessor()
00006 {
00007   SetComponentBreakReturnsFailure();
00008   
00009   fShaperTreeWriter = new ORBasicTreeWriter(&fShaperDecoder, "shaperTree");
00010   AddProcessor(fShaperTreeWriter);
00011   
00012   fTriggerTreeWriter = new ORTrig4ChanTreeWriter("triggerTree");
00013   AddProcessor(fTriggerTreeWriter);
00014   
00015   fLastTriggerRecordPtr = NULL;
00016 }
00017 
00018 ORTrig4ChanShaperCompoundProcessor::~ORTrig4ChanShaperCompoundProcessor()
00019 {
00020   if(fLastTriggerRecordPtr) {
00021     delete[] fLastTriggerRecordPtr;
00022   }
00023   delete fShaperTreeWriter;
00024   delete fTriggerTreeWriter;
00025 }
00026 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTrig4ChanShaperCompoundProcessor::StartRun()
00027 {
00028   fShaperDataId = fShaperTreeWriter->GetDataId();
00029   fTriggerDataId = fTriggerTreeWriter->GetDataId();
00030   
00031   return ORCompoundDataProcessor::StartRun();
00032 }
00033 
00034 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTrig4ChanShaperCompoundProcessor::EndRun()
00035 {
00036 
00037   if(fLastTriggerRecordPtr) {
00038     delete[] fLastTriggerRecordPtr;
00039     fLastTriggerRecordPtr = NULL;
00040   }
00041   return ORCompoundDataProcessor::EndRun();
00042 }
00043 
00044 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTrig4ChanShaperCompoundProcessor::ProcessDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00045 {
00046   /* Call the parent function here, since it takes care of data swapping. */
00047   ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode code = 
00048     ORCompoundDataProcessor::ProcessDataRecord(record);
00049   if ( code != kSuccess ) return code;
00050   
00051   UInt_t thisDataId = fShaperDecoder.DataIdOf(record);
00052   if( thisDataId == fShaperDataId ) {
00053     if ( fLastRecordDataId == fShaperDataId ) {
00054       //duplicate trigger record
00055       /* Here the last record was a shaper, so we have to duplicate the record. */
00056       /* Call the trigger tree writer to do this. */
00057       code = fTriggerTreeWriter->ProcessDataRecord(fLastTriggerRecordPtr);
00058     }  else {
00059       code = kSuccess;
00060     } 
00061     fLastRecordDataId = thisDataId;  
00062   } else if( thisDataId == fTriggerDataId ) {
00063     //normal processing
00064     if (fLastTriggerRecordPtr==NULL) { 
00065       /* if not allocated, reallocate a buffer and then copy. */
00066       fTriggerRecordLength = fShaperDecoder.LengthOf(record);
00067       fLastTriggerRecordPtr = new UInt_t[fTriggerRecordLength];  
00068     }
00069     /* copy */
00070     memcpy(fLastTriggerRecordPtr, record, fTriggerRecordLength*sizeof(UInt_t));
00071     fLastRecordDataId = thisDataId;  
00072     code = kSuccess;
00073   } 
00074   return code;
00075 }
